Player History
Drafted in 44th round, 701st overall pick, by Chicago in 2015...
Had first career hit on 9/13/2017, off Teo Apodaca (NY)...
Hit first career homerun on 10/1/2018, off Bernie Stanford (SEA)...
Traded from Chicago to Atlanta on 3/2/2019 (Going to CHI: P Jim Palmer Jr.. Going to ATL: RF Antony Stedman, P Henry Lee, P Roberto Ortiz)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/2019, hitting .545 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/2019, hitting .375 with 7 HR, 17 RBI...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against St. Louis (C) on 9/20/2019...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $600,000 through salary arbitration...
